title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example on Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. However, when attempting to move them, it is observed that they do not have any effect. This issue is particularly noticeable when opening a small image, such as an icon, as the scrollbars become misleading since they do not function as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only).
2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled.
3. Attempt to move the scrollbars.
4. Observe that the scrollbars do not have any effect.
5. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
